Articles.Content:
Hey, I know that extra planets/muns and other things in the solar system is planned in the upcoming feature list, but I\'m impatient. 

Is there a mod for additional planets? Tried google and the forum search, don\'t seem to be able to find anything.
No. There\'s part gravity, though, with which up to 2km objects can be made gravitational.
Why isn\'t there? Correct me if I\'m wrong, but isn\'t it just copying the stats of the mun (modifying it a bit of course) and place it in orbit around kerbol?
The data for stars/planets/moons/etc are not odder-accessable yet, afaik.

> 
> Is there a mod for additional planets? Tried google and the forum search, don\'t seem to be able to find anything.

Most likely because it isn\'t 

> 
> just copying the stats of the mun (modifying it a bit of course) and place it in orbit around kerbol

> 
> Most likely because it isn\'t

I know, but the first thing forumdwellers mention when asking about something is generally that I should have checked the forums for it.

but non-accessible data makes sense, thanks

Somebody succeeded in modding it enough so he had extra planets and even suns, but with version 0.21 all his work was rendered useless and he abandoned it, there's a 48page monsterthread somewhere on the ksp forums, there are even video's of the guy showing off his work!

> 
> somebody succeeded in modding it enough so he had extra planets and even suns, but with version 0.21 all his work was rendered useless and he abandoned it, there's a 48page monsterthread somewhere on the ksp forums, there are even video's of the guy showing off his work!

y u do dis?

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51893-Journey-to-Sentar-Other-Worlds](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51893-Journey-to-Sentar-Other-Worlds)

You should read this thread if you are interested in planet mod ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) There are even pictures. Hopefully there will be something more tangible than that in due time.

> 
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51893-Journey-to-Sentar-Other-Worlds](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51893-Journey-to-Sentar-Other-Worlds)
> You should read this thread if you are interested in planet mod ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) There are even pictures. Hopefully there will be something more tangible than that in due time.

dang it you beat me to it i was gonna post the link to the thread

Though it is not technically against the rules, Necroposting (i.e. Posting in threads that are old) is not generally [good form.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/13142-The-Good-Conduct-Guide) 

If you have something to add to the discussion please feel free to make a new topic.
